verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> cause <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> to know <WH3045> <WH853> her abominations, <WH8441>

And say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> unto Jerusalem; <WH3389> Thy birth <WH4351> and thy nativity <WH4138> is of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3669> thy father <WH1> was an Amorite, <WH567> and thy mother <WH517> a Hittite. <WH2851>

And as for thy nativity, <WH4138> in the day <WH3117> thou wast born <WH3205> thy navel <WH8270> was not <WH3808> cut, <WH3772> neither <WH3808> wast thou washed <WH7364> in water <WH4325> to supple <WH4935> thee; thou wast not <WH3808> salted at all, <WH4414> <WH4414> nor <WH3808> swaddled at all. <WH2853> <WH2853>

None <WH3808> eye <WH5869> pitied <WH2347> <WH5921> thee, to do <WH6213> any <WH259> of these <WH4480> <WH428> unto thee, to have compassion <WH2550> upon <WH5921> thee; but thou wast cast out <WH7993> in <WH413> the open <WH6440> field, <WH7704> to the loathing <WH1604> of thy person, <WH5315> in the day <WH3117> that thou wast born. <WH3205>

And when I passed <WH5674> by <WH5921> thee, and saw <WH7200> thee polluted <WH947> in thine own blood, <WH1818> I said <WH559> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, <WH1818> Live; <WH2421> yea, I said <WH559> unto thee when thou wast in thy blood, <WH1818> Live. <WH2421>

I have caused <WH5414> thee to multiply <WH7233> as the bud <WH6780> of the field, <WH7704> and thou hast increased <WH7235> and waxen great, <WH1431> and thou art come <WH935> to excellent <WH5716> ornaments: <WH5716> thy breasts <WH7699> are fashioned, <WH3559> and thine hair <WH8181> is grown, <WH6779> whereas thou <WH859> wast naked <WH5903> and bare. <WH6181>

Now when I passed <WH5674> by <WH5921> thee, and looked upon <WH7200> thee, behold, <WH2009> thy time <WH6256> was the time <WH6256> of love; <WH1730> and I spread <WH6566> my skirt <WH3671> over <WH5921> thee, and covered <WH3680> thy nakedness: <WH6172> yea, I swore <WH7650> unto thee, and entered <WH935> into a covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> thee, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> and thou becamest <WH1961> mine.
Then washed <WH7364> I thee with water; <WH4325> yea, I throughly washed away <WH7857> thy blood <WH1818> from <WH4480> <WH5921> thee, and I anointed <WH5480> thee with oil. <WH8081>

I clothed <WH3847> thee also with embroidered work, <WH7553> and shod <WH5274> thee with badgers' skin, <WH8476> and I girded thee about <WH2280> with fine linen, <WH8336> and I covered <WH3680> thee with silk. <WH4897>
I decked <WH5710> thee also with ornaments, <WH5716> and I put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> upon <WH5921> thy hands, <WH3027> and a chain <WH7242> on <WH5921> thy neck. <WH1627>
And I put <WH5414> a jewel <WH5141> on <WH5921> thy forehead, <WH639> and earrings <WH5694> in <WH5921> thine ears, <WH241> and a beautiful <WH8597> crown <WH5850> upon thine head. <WH7218>

Thus wast thou decked <WH5710> with gold <WH2091> and silver; <WH3701> and thy raiment <WH4403> was of fine linen, <WH8336> and silk, <WH4897> and embroidered work; <WH7553> thou didst eat <WH398> fine flour, <WH5560> and honey, <WH1706> and oil: <WH8081> and thou wast exceeding beautiful, <WH3302> <WH3966> <WH3966> and thou didst prosper <WH6743> into a kingdom. <WH4410>

And thy renown <WH8034> went forth <WH3318> among the heathen <WH1471> for thy beauty: <WH3308> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> was perfect <WH3632> through my comeliness, <WH1926> which <WH834> I had put <WH7760> upon <WH5921> thee, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

But thou didst trust <WH982> in thine own beauty, <WH3308> and playedst the harlot <WH2181> because <WH5921> of thy renown, <WH8034> and pouredst out <WH8210> <WH853> thy fornications <WH8457> on <WH5921> every one <WH3605> that passed by; <WH5674> his it was. <WH1961>

And of thy garments <WH4480> <WH899> thou didst take, <WH3947> and deckedst <WH6213> thy high places <WH1116> with divers colors, <WH2921> and playedst the harlot <WH2181> thereupon: <WH5921> the like things shall not <WH3808> come, <WH935> neither <WH3808> shall it be <WH1961> so.

Thou hast also taken <WH3947> thy fair <WH8597> jewels <WH3627> of my gold <WH4480> <WH2091> and of my silver, <WH4480> <WH3701> which <WH834> I had given <WH5414> thee, and madest <WH6213> to thyself images <WH6754> of men, <WH2145> and didst commit whoredom <WH2181> with them,
And tookest <WH3947> thine embroidered <WH7553> <WH853> garments, <WH899> and coveredst <WH3680> them: and thou hast set <WH5414> mine oil <WH8081> and mine incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> them.

My meat <WH3899> also which <WH834> I gave <WH5414> thee, fine flour, <WH5560> and oil, <WH8081> and honey, <WH1706> wherewith I fed <WH398> thee, thou hast even set <WH5414> it before <WH6440> them for a sweet <WH5207> savor: <WH7381> and thus it was, <WH1961> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

Moreover thou hast taken <WH3947> <WH853> thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters, <WH1323> whom <WH834> thou hast borne <WH3205> unto me, and these hast thou sacrificed <WH2076> unto them to be devoured. <WH398> Is this of <WH4480> thy whoredoms <WH8457> a small matter, <WH4592>
That thou hast slain <WH7819> <WH853> my children, <WH1121> and delivered <WH5414> them to cause them to pass through <WH5674> the fire for them?

And in all <WH3605> thine abominations <WH8441> and thy whoredoms <WH8457> thou hast not <WH3808> remembered <WH2142> <WH853> the days <WH3117> of thy youth, <WH5271> when thou wast <WH1961> naked <WH5903> and bare, <WH6181> and wast <WH1961> polluted <WH947> in thy blood. <WH1818>
And it came to pass <WH1961> after <WH310> all <WH3605> thy wickedness, <WH7451> (woe, <WH188> woe <WH188> unto thee! saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD;) <WH3069>
That thou hast also built <WH1129> unto thee an eminent place, <WH1354> and hast made <WH6213> thee a high place <WH7413> in every <WH3605> street. <WH7339>

Thou hast built <WH1129> thy high place <WH7413> at <WH413> every <WH3605> head <WH7218> of the way, <WH1870> and hast made <WH853> thy beauty <WH3308> to be abhorred, <WH8581> and hast opened <WH6589> <WH853> thy feet <WH7272> to every one <WH3605> that passed by, <WH5674> and multiplied <WH7235> <WH853> thy whoredoms. <WH8457>

Thou hast also committed fornication <WH2181> with <WH413> the Egyptians <WH1121> <WH4714> thy neighbors, <WH7934> great <WH1432> of flesh; <WH1320> and hast increased <WH7235> <WH853> thy whoredoms, <WH8457> to provoke me to anger. <WH3707>

Behold, <WH2009> therefore I have stretched out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> over <WH5921> thee, and have diminished <WH1639> thine ordinary <WH2706> food, and delivered <WH5414> thee unto the will <WH5315> of them that hate <WH8130> thee, the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines, <WH6430> which are ashamed <WH3637> of thy lewd <WH2154> way. <WH4480> <WH1870>

Thou hast played the whore <WH2181> also with <WH413> the Assyrians, <WH1121> <WH804> because thou wast unsatiable; <WH4480> <WH1115> <WH7654> yea, thou hast played the harlot <WH2181> with them, and yet <WH1571> couldest not <WH3808> be satisfied. <WH7646>

Thou hast moreover multiplied <WH7235> <WH853> thy fornication <WH8457> in <WH413> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> unto Chaldea; <WH3778> and yet <WH1571> thou wast not <WH3808> satisfied <WH7646> herewith. <WH2063>

How <WH4100> weak <WH535> is thine heart, <WH3826> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> seeing thou doest <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things, the work <WH4639> of an imperious <WH7986> whorish <WH2181> woman; <WH802>

In that thou buildest <WH1129> thine eminent place <WH1354> in the head <WH7218> of every <WH3605> way, <WH1870> and makest <WH6213> thine high place <WH7413> in every <WH3605> street; <WH7339> and hast not <WH3808> been <WH1961> as a harlot, <WH2181> in that thou scornest <WH7046> hire; <WH868>
But as a wife <WH802> that committeth adultery, <WH5003> which taketh <WH3947> <WH853> strangers <WH2114> instead <WH8478> of her husband! <WH376>

They give <WH5414> gifts <WH5078> to all <WH3605> whores: <WH2181> but thou <WH859> givest <WH5414> <WH853> thy gifts <WH5083> to all <WH3605> thy lovers, <WH157> and hirest <WH7809> them, that they may come <WH935> unto <WH413> thee on every side <WH4480> <WH5439> for thy whoredom. <WH8457>

And the contrary <WH2016> is <WH1961> in thee from <WH4480> other women <WH802> in thy whoredoms, <WH8457> whereas none <WH3808> followeth <WH310> thee to commit whoredoms: <WH2181> and in that thou givest <WH5414> a reward, <WH868> and no <WH3808> reward <WH868> is given <WH5414> unto thee, therefore thou art <WH1961> contrary. <WH2016>
Wherefore, <WH3651> O harlot, <WH2181> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD: <WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Because <WH3282> thy filthiness <WH5178> was poured out, <WH8210> and thy nakedness <WH6172> discovered <WH1540> through thy whoredoms <WH8457> with <WH5921> thy lovers, <WH157> and with <WH5921> all <WH3605> the idols <WH1544> of thy abominations, <WH8441> and by the blood <WH1818> of thy children, <WH1121> which <WH834> thou didst give <WH5414> unto them;

Behold, <WH2009> therefore <WH3651> I will gather <WH6908> <WH853> all <WH3605> thy lovers, <WH157> with <WH5921> whom <WH834> thou hast taken pleasure, <WH6149> and all <WH3605> them that <WH834> thou hast loved, <WH157> with <WH5921> all <WH3605> them that <WH834> thou hast hated; <WH8130> I will even gather <WH6908> them round about <WH4480> <WH5439> against <WH5921> thee, and will discover <WH1540> thy nakedness <WH6172> unto <WH413> them, that they may see <WH7200> <WH853> all <WH3605> thy nakedness. <WH6172>

And I will judge <WH8199> thee, as women that break wedlock <WH5003> and shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818> are judged; <WH4941> and I will give <WH5414> thee blood <WH1818> in fury <WH2534> and jealousy. <WH7068>

And I will also give <WH5414> thee into their hand, <WH3027> and they shall throw down <WH2040> thine eminent place, <WH1354> and shall break down <WH5422> thy high places: <WH7413> they shall strip <WH6584> thee also of thy clothes, <WH899> and shall take <WH3947> thy fair <WH8597> jewels, <WH3627> and leave <WH5117> thee naked <WH5903> and bare. <WH6181>
They shall also bring up <WH5927> a company <WH6951> against <WH5921> thee, and they shall stone <WH7275> thee with stones, <WH68> and thrust thee through <WH1333> with their swords. <WH2719>

And they shall burn <WH8313> thine houses <WH1004> with fire, <WH784> and execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201> upon thee in the sight <WH5869> of many <WH7227> women: <WH802> and I will cause thee to cease <WH7673> from playing the harlot, <WH4480> <WH2181> and thou also <WH1571> shalt give <WH5414> no <WH3808> hire <WH868> any more. <WH5750>

So will I make my fury <WH2534> toward thee to rest, <WH5117> and my jealousy <WH7068> shall depart <WH5493> from <WH4480> thee, and I will be quiet, <WH8252> and will be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> angry. <WH3707>

Because <WH3282> <WH834> thou hast not <WH3808> remembered <WH2142> <WH853> the days <WH3117> of thy youth, <WH5271> but hast fretted <WH7264> me in all <WH3605> these <WH428> things; behold, <WH1887> therefore I <WH589> also <WH1571> will recompense <WH5414> thy way <WH1870> upon thine head, <WH7218> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD: <WH3069> and thou shalt not <WH3808> commit <WH6213> <WH853> this lewdness <WH2154> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> thine abominations. <WH8441>
Behold, <WH2009> every one <WH3605> that useth proverbs <WH4911> shall use this proverb <WH4911> against <WH5921> thee, saying, <WH559> As is the mother, <WH517> so is her daughter. <WH1323>

Thou <WH859> art thy mother's <WH517> daughter, <WH1323> that loatheth <WH1602> her husband <WH376> and her children; <WH1121> and thou <WH859> art the sister <WH269> of thy sisters, <WH269> which <WH834> loathed <WH1602> their husbands <WH376> and their children: <WH1121> your mother <WH517> was a Hittite, <WH2851> and your father <WH1> an Amorite. <WH567>

And thine elder <WH1419> sister <WH269> is Samaria, <WH8111> she <WH1931> and her daughters <WH1323> that dwell <WH3427> at <WH5921> thy left hand: <WH8040> and thy younger <WH6996> sister, <WH269> that dwelleth <WH3427> at thy right hand, <WH4480> <WH3225> is Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters. <WH1323>

Yet hast thou not <WH3808> walked <WH1980> after their ways, <WH1870> nor done <WH6213> after their abominations: <WH8441> but, as if that were a very <WH6985> little <WH4592> thing, thou wast corrupted <WH7843> more than <WH4480> they in all <WH3605> thy ways. <WH1870>

As I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> Sodom <WH5467> thy sister <WH269> hath not <WH518> done, <WH6213> she <WH1931> nor her daughters, <WH1323> as <WH834> thou hast done, <WH6213> thou <WH859> and thy daughters. <WH1323>

Behold, <WH2009> this <WH2088> was <WH1961> the iniquity <WH5771> of thy sister <WH269> Sodom, <WH5467> pride, <WH1347> fullness <WH7653> of bread, <WH3899> and abundance <WH7962> of idleness <WH8252> was <WH1961> in her and in her daughters, <WH1323> neither <WH3808> did she strengthen <WH2388> the hand <WH3027> of the poor <WH6041> and needy. <WH34>
And they were haughty, <WH1361> and committed <WH6213> abomination <WH8441> before <WH6440> me: therefore I took them away <WH5493> <WH853> as <WH834> I saw <WH7200> good.

Neither <WH3808> hath Samaria <WH8111> committed <WH2398> half <WH2677> of thy sins; <WH2403> but thou hast multiplied <WH7235> <WH853> thine abominations <WH8441> more than <WH4480> they, and hast justified <WH6663> <WH853> thy sisters <WH269> in all <WH3605> thine abominations <WH8441> which <WH834> thou hast done. <WH6213>

Thou <WH859> also, <WH1571> which <WH834> hast judged <WH6419> thy sisters, <WH269> bear <WH5375> thine own shame <WH3639> for thy sins <WH2403> that <WH834> thou hast committed more abominable <WH8581> than <WH4480> they: they are more righteous <WH6663> than <WH4480> thou: yea, be thou confounded <WH954> <WH859> also, <WH1571> and bear <WH5375> thy shame, <WH3639> in that thou hast justified <WH6663> thy sisters. <WH269>

When I shall bring again <WH7725> <WH853> their captivity, <WH7622> <WH853> the captivity <WH7622> of Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters, <WH1323> and the captivity <WH7622> of Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters, <WH1323> then will I bring again the captivity <WH7622> of thy captives <WH7622> in the midst <WH8432> of them:

That <WH4616> thou mayest bear <WH5375> thine own shame, <WH3639> and mayest be confounded <WH3637> in all <WH4480> <WH3605> that <WH834> thou hast done, <WH6213> in that thou art a comfort <WH5162> unto them.

When thy sisters, <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> and her daughters, <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to their former estate, <WH6927> and Samaria <WH8111> and her daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to their former estate, <WH6927> then thou <WH859> and thy daughters <WH1323> shall return <WH7725> to your former estate. <WH6927>
For thy sister <WH269> Sodom <WH5467> was <WH1961> not <WH3808> mentioned <WH8052> by thy mouth <WH6310> in the day <WH3117> of thy pride, <WH1347>

Before <WH2962> thy wickedness <WH7451> was discovered, <WH1540> as at <WH3644> the time <WH6256> of thy reproach <WH2781> of the daughters <WH1323> of Syria, <WH758> and all <WH3605> that are round about <WH5439> her, the daughters <WH1323> of the Philistines, <WH6430> which despise <WH7590> thee round about. <WH4480> <WH5439>
Thou <WH859> hast borne <WH5375> <WH853> thy lewdness <WH2154> and thine abominations, <WH8441> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will even deal <WH6213> with <WH854> thee as <WH834> thou hast done, <WH6213> which <WH834> hast despised <WH959> the oath <WH423> in breaking <WH6565> the covenant. <WH1285>

Nevertheless I <WH589> will remember <WH2142> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> thee in the days <WH3117> of thy youth, <WH5271> and I will establish <WH6965> unto thee an everlasting <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

Then thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH853> thy ways, <WH1870> and be ashamed, <WH3637> when thou shalt receive <WH3947> <WH853> thy sisters, <WH269> thine elder <WH1419> and thy younger: <WH6996> and I will give <WH5414> them unto thee for daughters, <WH1323> but not <WH3808> by thy covenant. <WH4480> <WH1285>
And I <WH589> will establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> thee; and thou shalt know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD: <WH3068>

That <WH4616> thou mayest remember, <WH2142> and be confounded, <WH954> and never <WH3808> open <WH6610> thy mouth <WH6310> any more <WH5750> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of thy shame, <WH3639> when I am pacified <WH3722> toward thee for all <WH3605> that <WH834> thou hast done, <WH6213> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
